We are changing the way people watch movies and TV shows, with over 200,000 titles available on-demand across a multitude of devices. As Program Manager, you will play a critical role in the Partner Integration Management team and will be integral in transforming the way our partners deliver content to Prime Video. We envision that all partners, regardless of , capability, location or language are able to reach customers, on time and with the highest quality, in a manner that is self-service and friction free. Deep knowledge and understanding with common OTT file formats.
